components.name: Asphalt Roll Layer 2.5mm
components.spec: An economical choice for low-slope and flat roofs, providing a waterproof barrier. Often used in multi-layer systems for enhanced durability and longevity.

components.name: Asphalt Shingle 6mm
components.spec: A popular and versatile roofing material, known for its ease of installation and wide range of color and style choices. Offers good fire resistance and is suitable for a variety of pitched roof designs.

components.name: Timber Batten 70x35mm
components.spec: Essential for creating a drainage plane and ventilation gap in roofing and cladding systems. Can also be used for ceiling joists and other framing applications. Complies with NZS 3604 for timber-framed buildings.

components.name: Brick Veneer 70mm
components.spec: Offers a classic and durable exterior finish with excellent thermal mass, contributing to energy efficiency. Low maintenance and resistant to fire and pests. Supplied by leading brands like Midland Brick and Firth.

components.name: Brick Veneer 90mm
components.spec: Provides a robust and traditional cladding solution with high thermal mass for improved temperature regulation. Offers superior durability, low maintenance, and a wide range of aesthetic options. Supplied by reputable manufacturers such as Midland Brick and Firth.

components.name: Fiber Cement Board 15mm
components.spec: A versatile and durable cladding material resistant to rot, fire, and termites. Can be used in a variety of external applications and is available with fire and acoustic ratings, meeting New Zealand's stringent building standards.

components.name: Fiber Cement Board (FR) 6mm
components.spec: Specifically designed for fire-rated ceiling systems to meet compliance requirements. A durable and stable lining option, supplied by trusted brands like James Hardie.

components.name: Fiber Cement Board (FR) 9mm
components.spec: Provides enhanced fire resistance for ceiling linings, crucial for meeting building code regulations in commercial and residential construction. A reliable solution from leading suppliers like James Hardie.

components.name: Ceramic Tile on PB Flooring
components.spec: A premium flooring finish that is both durable and water-resistant, making it ideal for wet areas like bathrooms and kitchens. Offers a high-end aesthetic and is easy to clean and maintain.

components.name: Concrete Block 140mm
components.spec: A strong, load-bearing construction material suitable for both commercial and residential boundary walls. Offers excellent durability, fire resistance, and sound insulation properties.

components.name: Concrete Block 190mm
components.spec: A robust and versatile load-bearing element for commercial and residential construction, particularly for boundary walls. Provides superior strength, durability, and acoustic performance.

components.name: Concrete Block 240mm
components.spec: A heavy-duty load-bearing block for substantial commercial and residential wall construction. Offers maximum strength, durability, and excellent fire and sound resistance.

components.name: Concrete Tile 22mm
components.spec: A long-lasting and fire-resistant roofing option for pitched roofs. Concrete tiles are known for their durability in harsh weather conditions and come in a variety of profiles and colors to suit different architectural styles.

components.name: Corrugated Aluminium 0.70mm
components.spec: A lightweight and corrosion-resistant roofing material, making it an excellent choice for coastal and marine environments. Its durability ensures a long service life with minimal maintenance.

components.name: Corrugated Aluminium 0.90mm
components.spec: A heavier gauge corrugated aluminium for increased strength and durability, particularly suitable for roofing in demanding coastal and marine locations. Offers excellent corrosion resistance and a long lifespan.

components.name: Corrugated Steel 0.40mm
components.spec: Long-run steel profiles offering high corrosion resistance, suitable for all New Zealand climates. A durable and low-maintenance roofing solution from trusted suppliers like Colorsteel, Metalcraft, and Gerard.

components.name: Corrugated Steel / Colorsteel 0.55mm
components.spec: Thicker gauge long-run steel profiles for enhanced durability and performance in all New Zealand climates. Offers excellent corrosion resistance and a wide range of color options from leading brands like Colorsteel, Metalcraft, and Gerard.

components.name: Corrugated Steel 1.00mm
components.spec: Heavy-duty long-run steel profiles designed for maximum durability and corrosion resistance, suitable for the most demanding New Zealand environments. Supplied by leading manufacturers such as Colorsteel, Metalcraft, and Gerard.

components.name: DHS Purlin (Depth 250-400)
components.spec: Lightweight yet strong steel solutions for long-span roofing frameworks, allowing for efficient and economical roof or floor construction.

components.name: DHS Purlin (Depth Below 200)
components.spec: Cost-effective and lightweight steel purlins for smaller span roofing frameworks in residential and commercial buildings.

components.name: EPDM Rubber 1.7mm
components.spec: A high-performance synthetic rubber membrane ideal for low-pitch and flat roofs. Offers exceptional resistance to UV radiation, extreme weather, and ozone, ensuring a long-lasting and watertight seal.

components.name: Fiber Cement Panel with Battens
components.spec: A modern and fire-resistant cladding system that provides a sleek, monolithic appearance. Low maintenance and highly durable, it's a popular choice for contemporary residential and commercial buildings. Supplied by James Hardie and other leading manufacturers.

components.name: Fiber Cement Shingle 9mm
components.spec: Offers the aesthetic of traditional shingles with the durability and low maintenance of fiber cement. Resistant to fire, rot, and pests, making it a long-lasting roofing solution from suppliers like James Hardie.

components.name: GIB Braceline 10mm
components.spec: A key component of New Zealand's drywall systems, providing bracing elements for walls and ceilings. Part of the GIB range known for its fire, acoustic, and structural ratings.

components.name: GIB Braceline 13mm
components.spec: A thicker and more robust plasterboard for enhanced bracing performance in walls and ceilings. GIB Braceline is a trusted solution in New Zealand for achieving required structural and fire safety standards.

components.name: GIB Fyreline 16mm
components.spec: A fire-resistant plasterboard from New Zealand's leading drywall manufacturer. Provides critical fire protection for walls and ceilings, along with acoustic and bracing capabilities, to meet building code requirements.

components.name: GIB Fyreline 19mm
components.spec: A high-performance, thick fire-resistant plasterboard for applications requiring superior fire ratings. Part of the GIB Fyreline range, it also offers excellent acoustic and bracing properties for comprehensive wall and ceiling solutions.

components.name: GIB Fyreline 2x16mm
components.spec: A double-layered system of GIB Fyreline for achieving high-level fire ratings in walls and ceilings. This system is a critical component in passive fire protection design in New Zealand buildings.

components.name: HDF Board 18mm
components.spec: A durable and dense fiberboard suitable as a substrate or a finished flooring surface for medium to heavy loads. Offers a stable and consistent base for various floor coverings.

components.name: HyHoist HJ200x45
components.spec: A lightweight and strong LVL (Laminated Veneer Lumber) I-joist, engineered for consistent performance in floor and roof framing. Its dimensional stability reduces issues like shrinking and warping.

components.name: HyHoist HJ240x45
components.spec: An engineered LVL I-joist providing a cost-effective and lightweight solution for residential and commercial construction. Offers greater design flexibility and is easy to install.

components.name: HyHoist HJ240x63
components.spec: A strong and lightweight engineered LVL I-joist suitable for residential and commercial construction. Its composition of structural LVL flanges and a structural plywood web ensures durability and ease of installation.

components.name: HyHoist HJ240x90
components.spec: A high-strength LVL I-joist, engineered for applications requiring longer spans or heavier loads. Provides consistent, reliable performance in floor and roof systems.

components.name: HyHoist HJ300x45
components.spec: A deep and efficient LVL I-joist, ideal for long-span floor and roof applications. Its engineered design ensures straightness and uniformity, simplifying construction.

components.name: HyHoist HJ300x63
components.spec: A robust LVL I-joist with wider flanges for increased strength and stability in demanding floor and roof structures.

components.name: HyHoist HJ300x90
components.spec: A heavy-duty LVL I-joist designed for maximum strength in long-span or heavily loaded floor and roof systems.

components.name: HyHoist HJ360x63
components.spec: A deep and strong LVL I-joist, providing a lightweight and cost-effective solution for long-span residential and commercial construction.

components.name: HyHoist HJ360x90
components.spec: A high-capacity LVL I-joist engineered for the most demanding long-span applications in floor and roof construction. Offers superior strength and rigidity.

components.name: Light Gauge Battens 70x35x0.55mm
components.spec: A lightweight and durable steel batten system for fixing cladding, roofing, ceiling, and other materials. Offers a straight and true fixing surface that is resistant to rot and pests.

components.name: Light Gauge Steel 50x0.55mm
components.spec: A versatile and lightweight steel stud for use in light partition walls. Easy to handle and install, providing a straight and stable frame that is resistant to fire and pests.

components.name: Light Gauge Steel 90x0.55mm
components.spec: A durable and dimensionally stable alternative to timber framing, commonly used in commercial and modern residential buildings. Resistant to rot, pests, and fire, it provides a long-lasting and low-maintenance structural solution.

components.name: Light Gauge Steel 90x0.75mm
components.spec: A heavier gauge steel stud offering increased strength and rigidity for load-bearing walls and other structural applications. A preferred choice in commercial and modern residential construction for its durability and resistance to environmental factors.

components.name: Light Gauge Steel 90x1.0mm
components.spec: A high-strength light gauge steel stud for demanding structural applications in commercial and residential buildings. Provides excellent load-bearing capacity and dimensional stability as an alternative to traditional timber framing.

components.name: Metal Cladding 0.55mm
components.spec: Durable long-run steel profiles that provide a weather-tight and low-maintenance exterior. With high corrosion resistance, they are suitable for all NZ climates. Available from leading suppliers like Colorsteel, Metalcraft, and Gerard.

components.name: Matel Tile, Shingle
components.spec: Combines the durability and strength of steel with the classic aesthetic of traditional tiles. A lightweight and long-lasting roofing solution from trusted brands like Gerard, offering excellent weather resistance.

components.name: Membrane 4mm
components.spec: A robust and flexible waterproofing membrane ideal for low-pitch and flat roofs. Offers strong resistance to UV radiation and storms, ensuring a durable and watertight roofing system.

components.name: Nu-Wall Cladding
components.spec: A premium aluminium cladding system known for its exceptional durability and resistance to corrosion, making it ideal for New Zealand's coastal environments. Offers a contemporary aesthetic with a range of profiles and finishes.

components.name: Parallel Chord Truss
components.spec: Engineered steel or timber truss systems designed for long-span roof or floor frameworks. They allow for large open spaces and provide efficient and cost-effective structural solutions.

components.name: Particle or Flake Board 18mm
components.spec: A cost-effective and standard flooring substrate for residential construction. Provides a smooth and stable base for a variety of floor coverings.

components.name: Particle & Flake Board 12mm
components.spec: An economical lining option for ceilings in various types of buildings. Provides a smooth surface for finishing.

components.name: Plaster Board 10mm
components.spec: A standard and versatile plasterboard for general use in wall and ceiling linings. Provides a smooth, durable surface for painting and finishing.

components.name: Plaster Board 13mm
components.spec: A thicker plasterboard for enhanced durability, acoustic performance, and impact resistance in wall and ceiling applications.

components.name: Plaster EIFS
components.spec: Exterior Insulation and Finish System (EIFS) provides a modern, monolithic plaster look with the added benefit of continuous exterior insulation, improving the thermal performance of the building.

components.name: Plywood 13mm
components.spec: A versatile structural panel used for bracing, flooring, and ceiling linings, particularly in bespoke, high-end residential projects. Offers excellent strength and stability.

components.name: Plywood 16mm
components.spec: A thicker plywood for applications requiring greater strength and rigidity, such as flooring and structural bracing. Also used for feature ceilings in high-end architectural designs.

components.name: Plywood 19mm
components.spec: A heavy-duty plywood for demanding structural applications including flooring, bracing, and feature ceilings. Provides maximum strength and stiffness.

components.name: Precast Panel 100mm
components.spec: A durable and efficient precast reinforced concrete wall panel. Manufactured off-site for rapid on-site construction, offering excellent fire resistance and thermal mass.

components.name: Precast Panel 150mm
components.spec: A thicker and more robust precast reinforced concrete wall panel for enhanced structural performance and durability. Ideal for a wide range of commercial and residential applications.

components.name: RC Slab 100mm
components.spec: A standard reinforced concrete slab for ground floors and suspended slabs. Provides a strong, durable, and fire-resistant base for buildings.

components.name: RibRaft / Waffle Slab 300mm
components.spec: A foundation system consisting of a 100mm slab with 200mm deep by 100mm wide ribs at 1.1-1.2m spacing. Offers a thermally efficient and cost-effective solution for residential and light commercial buildings.

components.name: RigidRAP 8mm
components.spec: A high-performance rigid air barrier for external cavity wall systems. Provides a weather-resistant and breathable layer, protecting the building frame from moisture and improving energy efficiency.

components.name: Stone Tile on PB 10mm
components.spec: A luxurious and durable flooring option, offering a high-end finish and excellent water resistance. Ideal for creating a premium look in residential and commercial interiors.
components.note: Estimated weight for tile and substrate

components.name: Stone Veneer 100mm
components.spec: A premium cladding that provides the timeless appeal of natural stone. Offers excellent durability and thermal mass, with higher initial costs but long-term value and aesthetic appeal.

components.name: Thermoplastic Polyolefin Membrane (TPO)
components.spec: A heat-reflective and energy-efficient roofing membrane for low-pitch and flat roofs. TPO is known for its durability, resistance to UV and chemical exposure, and is typically supplied in light colors to reduce heat absorption.

components.name: Timber 90x45mm
components.spec: A standard and versatile timber size for framing and studs, compliant with NZS 3604 for timber-framed buildings. Widely used in residential and light commercial construction.

components.name: Timber 140x45mm
components.spec: A common timber size for framing in accordance with NZS 3604, providing greater depth for increased insulation in walls. Also used for joists and roof framing.

components.name: Timber 190x45mm
components.spec: A larger timber dimension for joists and roof framing as per NZS 3604, allowing for longer spans and heavier loads.

components.name: Timber 240x45mm
components.spec: A deep timber section for long-span joists and roof framing, specified in accordance with NZS 3604 for structural integrity.

components.name: Timber 290x45mm
components.spec: A substantial timber size for heavy-duty joists and roof framing, meeting the requirements of NZS 3604 for demanding structural applications.

components.name: Timber 300x45mm
components.spec: A large-dimension timber for long-span joists in floor systems, designed and specified according to NZS 3604 for strength and performance.

components.name: Timber 360x45mm
components.spec: A very deep timber section for maximum span capability in floor joists, used in applications requiring significant structural support as per NZS 3604.

components.name: Timber 2/140x45mm
components.spec: A built-up timber member providing increased strength for studs and joists in situations requiring higher load-bearing capacity, in line with NZS 3604 principles.

components.name: Timber 2/90x45mm
components.spec: A doubled-up timber section for enhanced strength in studs and joists, used where additional structural support is needed as per NZS 3604.

components.name: Timber Nog 90x45mm
components.spec: Essential timber blocking or nogging used to provide lateral support to studs and joists within a timber frame, as required by NZS 3604 to ensure structural stability.

components.name: Timber Panel with Battens
components.spec: A premium hardwood timber panel cladding system that creates a durable and attractive building exterior. The battens provide a rainscreen cavity for moisture management.

components.name: Timber Truss 190mm
components.spec: A prefabricated timber truss for efficient and reliable roof framing. Engineered for specific loads and spans, they are a common component in residential and commercial construction.

components.name: Timber Truss 240mm
components.spec: A deeper prefabricated timber truss for longer spans or heavier roof loads. Provides a cost-effective and structurally sound solution for a wide range of roof designs.

components.name: Vinyl Cladding
components.spec: A low-maintenance and durable cladding option that is resistant to fading, scratching, and denting. Available in a variety of colors and profiles, it provides a long-lasting and attractive exterior finish.
components.note: The cladding board / sheet formed to 20-30mm thick

components.name: Weather Board - Fiber Cement
components.spec: Offers the classic look of timber weatherboards with the benefits of fiber cement: durability, low maintenance, and resistance to fire and rot. A popular choice for a long-lasting and attractive exterior.

components.name: Weather Board - HDF
components.spec: A sustainable cladding option made from high-density fiberboard. While offering a traditional weatherboard look, it may have lower durability compared to other materials.

components.name: Weather Board - Timber
components.spec: A classic and timeless cladding choice that provides a natural aesthetic. While beautiful, it requires regular maintenance to ensure its longevity and protect it from the elements.

components.name: Wood Shingle 12mm
components.spec: A traditional roofing material that offers a natural and rustic look, often used for heritage or rural properties. Durability is moderate and depends on the type of wood and maintenance.
